Class Mallet

java.lang.Object
Mallet
public class Mallet extends Object
This class is used to create the mallets for the air hockey game

    • collides

      public boolean collides(Puck p)
      Boolean method to check and see if a mallet collides with a Puck
      Parameters:
      p - the puck which is being checked to see if it collided with a mallet
      Returns:
      Returns true if the mallet is overlapping the puck
